type ForeignKeyAttributeConvention = class interface IForeignKeyAddedConvention interface IConvention interface INavigationAddedConvention interface IModelFinalizingConvention

summary.para: A convention that configures the foreign key properties associated with a navigation property based on the specified on the properties or the navigation properties.
For one-to-one relationships the attribute has to be specified on the navigation property pointing to the principal.
